data.system_settings: Macbook Pro 13" (2017 - With Touchbar), macOS High Sierra - Version 10.13.4
data.actual_result: There is no "x" to allow you to close the box anymore.
data.expected_result: An "x" appears when hovering over it, to allow you to close the box.
data.short_description: You can no longer close the video in-chat video box when in a group call whilst sharing screens.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a group/ be in a group - Start screen share in the call - Move from the DM chat to another group/ server/ anywhere else on Discord apart from the group with the call - Hover you mouse over the video box, to allow an "x" to appear, to try and close it - Observe that there is no longer an "x" to close the in-chat video box
